content: *****you can see the full free pattern through the link to my blog post here on ravelry there is also a printable version that is for sale through etsy enjoy ***** pretty open stitchwork an understated baby-doll fit make this a breezy comfortable summer top flattering on any figure it goes great with cut-off jean shorts skinny pants or wide-leg capris if you know basic crochet stitches you can make this top in no time and wear it all summer long it s crocheted in 2 pieces and seamed at the sides and shoulders super easy to make skill level easy + materials us size h 5 0 mm crochet hook or size to obtain correct gauge 4 5 6 7 8 9 lion brand yarn coboo in steel blue pattern uses approximately 330 g 436 g 501 g 601 g 709 g 827 g measuring tape tapestry needle scissors sizes xsmall small medium large xl xxl please follow the key throughout the pattern according to the size you are crocheting xs s m l xl xxl width approximate at narrowest point xs 15 5 s 17 5 m 19 5 l 21 5 xl 23 5 xxl 25 5
